Use candles: Candles are a traditional and eco-friendly option for lighting a room. You can place them in holders and strategically place them around the room to create a warm and cozy atmosphere.

Utilize string lights: String lights can be hung from the ceiling or wrapped around the room to create a warm and inviting ambiance. They can be battery-operated or plugged into an outlet, and come in a variety of colors and styles.

Use fairy lights: Fairy lights can be used to create a whimsical and magical atmosphere. They can be hung from the ceiling or wrapped around furniture and objects in the room. They come in various colors and can be battery-operated or plugged into an outlet.

Use LED lights: LED lights are energy-efficient and can be used to create a modern and sleek look. They can be hung from the ceiling or placed on the walls or shelves. They come in a variety of colors and can be controlled using a remote or smartphone app.

Use lanterns: Lanterns can be used to create a rustic and cozy atmosphere. They can be hung from the ceiling or placed on tables and shelves. They come in various materials and can be battery-operated or plugged into an outlet.
